seo.title: Terms of Use
seo.description: Terms governing the use of this website

sections.heading: Terms of Use
sections.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

sections.heading: Use License
sections.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on masterthepixel's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
restrictions: Using the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
Attempting to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the website

sections.content: The materials on masterthepixel's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Masterthepixel makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

sections.content: In no event shall masterthepixel or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on masterthepixel's website.

sections.heading: Accuracy of Materials
sections.content: The materials appearing on masterthepixel could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Masterthepixel does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current.

sections.heading: Links
sections.content: Masterthepixel has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by masterthepixel of the site.

sections.heading: Modifications
sections.content: Masterthepixel may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
